modul.name: SampleAndHold
modul.description: Sample and hold input signal at trigger frequency
modul.opcode: /* Sample and Hold */ opcode SampleAndHold, k, kk ktrigger, kin xin klasttrigger init 0 khold init 0 ktrigger limit ktrigger, 0, 1 if (klasttrigger == 0 && ktrigger == 1) then khold = 1 else khold = 0 endif klasttrigger = ktrigger kout samphold kin, khold xout kout endop
